Title: Illusion Sweetheart Bridal Gown with Tiered Trumpet Skirt

Featured-image: CK46-white-illusion-sweetheart-bridal-gown-with-tiered-trumpet-skirt_p.jpg

----

Description: Beaded floral patterns create a sweetheart bodice with a  sheer fabric creating a higher scooped neckline and an illusion back. The back of the bodice is decorated with the same beaded pattern that trims the neckline and capped sleeves. The form fitting skirt flares into a trumpet design with tiers of fabric creating a fuller skirt design.
